en.content: You throw a hand up. Your fingers wrap around a protrusion on the building. It holds your weight long enough for you to get solid ground under your feet. You look down. The drop is about twenty feet. That was close.

text.content: You may check-mark the small box beside the Climb skill.

zh.content: 你挥动手臂，手指紧紧地握住了屋墙上的一处凸起。你依靠它支撑全身的重量，直到脚再次触碰到坚固的地面才松开手。你向下张望，断崖大概有二十英尺深。你差点就没命了。

text.content: 你可以在「攀爬」技能左边的小方框里打勾。
